entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
